item.title: Complete Solidity Course With Projects 2023
item.description:
In this solidity course you will learn about solidity programming language along with that you will be building web3 decentralized solidity power web3 app.

Link

item.title: Data & AI Infrastructure for Web3
item.description:
Designed for apps and machine learning, Spice AI is helping developers working with web3 and blockchain data to build the next generation of apps. Easily get enterprise-scale data and AI infrastructure for web3.

Link

item.title: Blockchain Chat Dapp | Build Decentralize Chat Application On Ethereum
item.description:
This blockchain chat app is powered by smart contracts run on the #Ethereum blockchain using an avalanche text network, In this blockchain chap Dapp or decentralized chat application is one of the projects which you can include in your blockchain project portfolio.

Link

item.title: Build A Web3 DEX | FULL COURSE | React, Node, Moralis, 1Inch
item.description:
In this tutorial we build a fully functional Web3 Decentralized Exchange, from start to finish. It will allow users to swap erc20 tokens to other erc20 tokens on a selected EVM Chain.

Link

item.title: Build and Deploy a Web3 Blockchain Crowdfunding Platform
item.description:
With a stunning design, connected to the blockchain, metamask pairing, interaction with smart contracts, sending Ethereum through the blockchain network, writing solidity code, and, most importantly, the ability to create create, view, and donate to crowdfunding campaigns directly through the blockchain; this course is perfect to fully understand how web3, blockchain, Solidity, and smart contracts truly work behind the scenes.

Link

item.title: Build A Web3 DEX | FULL COURSE | React, Node, Moralis, 1Inch
item.description:
In this tutorial we build a fully functional Web3 Decentralized Exchange, from start to finish. It will allow users to swap erc20 tokens to other erc20 tokens on a selected EVM Chain.
